title: 2022 CUBE AMS ZERO99 & ONE11 reshape lighter carbon XC & Trail mountain bikes
content:
For 2022 German bike maker CUBE has reshaped their popular AMS full-suspension MTB platform into two new lighter carbon bikes. Sharing the same adjustable geometry front triangle, the short travel ZERO99 is your new XC race bike, and a slightly longer & more aggressive ONE11 becomes more downcountry or a light trail bike… 2022 Cube […]

The post 2022 CUBE AMS ZERO99 & ONE11 reshape lighter carbon XC & Trail mountain bikes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
